opinion.posture: Indictments charging defendant with aggravated assault and battery and assault and battery. Before ANDERSON, J., without a jury. Appeal, No. 451, Oct. T., 1973, from judgment of sentence of Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, May T., 1972, No. 1229. Submitted March 19, 1973.
opinion.attorneys: Austin J.McGreal, and Stahl McGreal, for appellant; Linda West Conley,James T. Ranney and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
